products.name: World of Tanks
products.description: If you like blowing up tanks, with a quick and intense game style you will love this game!

products.name: Warframe
products.description: A cooperative free-to-play third person online action shooter set in an stunning sci-fi world.

products.name: CRSED: F.O.A.D.
products.description: Take the battle royale genre and add  mystical powers and you have CRSED: F.O.A.D. (Aka Cuisine Royale: Second Edition)

products.name: Crossout
products.description: A post-apocalyptic MMO vehicle combat game!

products.name: Armored Warfare
products.description: A modern team-based MMO tank game from Obsidian Entertainment.

products.name: World of Warships
products.description: A 3D free to play naval action-themed MMO from the creators of World of Tanks!

products.name: War Thunder
products.description: A MMO shooter that puts you in command of hundreds of the finest combat vehicles of World War II.

products.name: Crossfire
products.description: A first person tactical shooter with a huge selection of game modes!

products.name: Splitgate: Arena Warfare
products.description: A free-to-play multiplayer shooter developed and published by 1047 games.

products.name: Destiny 2
products.description: A free-to-play multiplayer Sci-Fi MMOFPS from Bungie.

products.name: Apex Legends
products.description: A free-to-play strategic battle royale game featuring 60-player matches and team-based play.

products.name: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive
products.description: The popular multiplayer shooter from Valve.

products.name: Ring of Elysium
products.description: A free-to-play battle royale developed and published by Tencent Games.

products.name: Quake Champions
products.description: Quake Champions is a callback to the early days of the Quake IP, featuring the fast-paced action that made the IP popular over two decades ago.
